name: NO MAN'S LAND (yujings)
description:
NO MAN'S LAND

NO MAN'S LAND is an interactive fiction game that discovers time entanglement.

Landing on an uncanny space, players will arrive in a world where time does not function in linear form. Trapped in time, you will feel disorientation, disorder, and messy timelines, again and again. Although you encounter the same scenes over and over again, a timestamp will keep track of all of your statuses which indicates how long have you been trapped.
